short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered tool to summarize text or webpage content with text-to-speech support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SummarizeMe is an AI-powered Chrome extension designed to help users quickly summarize text or webpage content with text-to-speech functionality. With just one click, you can convert lengthy text into a concise summary and listen to the key points using our built-in text-to-speech feature.

Key Features:

Summarize text or webpage content instantly.
Toggle between light and dark mode for better readability.
Listen to the summarized text using the 'Read Aloud' feature.
Works seamlessly across various web pages.

This extension is perfect for students, professionals, or anyone looking to quickly extract the main points from an article or webpage. Improve your productivity and comprehension with SummarizeMe!
